com.google.code.morphia.mapping

Class MappedClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.code.morphia.mapping.MappedClass

  • public class MappedClass
extends Object
    Represents a mapped class between the MongoDB DBObject and the java POJO. This class will validate classes to make sure they meet the requirement for persistence.
